products.manufacturer: NEW WAY MFG. CO. OF AMER.

summary: THE TONGUE ON MY TRAILER BROKE OFF SEPARATING THE TRAILER FROM THE VEHICLE WHILE IN MOTION. THE MANUFACTURER REPLACED THE PARTS AND I HAD THEM WELDED ON PROPERLY. THE MANUFACTURER IS NEWMANS MANUFACTURING, INC LOCATED AT: 207 HIGHWAY 10, PO BOX 24, ROYALTON, MN 56373.  *JB

DT: THE 2004 NEWMAN SLED BED TRAILER JUST FELL APART ON THE HIGHWAY. CONSUMER HAD NOT BEEN TAKEN IT TO THE DEALERSHIP. HE DID HAVE PHOTOS AVAILABLE OF THE TRAILER. HE WANTED  NHTSA TO SEE THE TRAILER FIRST BEFORE HE TOOK IT TO THE DEALER  FOR REPAIRS. THE CHASSIS  FELL APART.  WHILE  DRIVING ON  THE HIGHWAY IT FELL APART. THIS WAS UNDER A LIGHT LOAD. *AK *JB
